tool_description: Gumroad helps creators take control of their creative careers.
name: Gumroad
title: Gumroad

api_list.name: createProductCustomField
api_list.description: Create a new custom field for a product.

api_list.name: createProductOfferCode
api_list.description: Create a new offer code for a product. Default offer code is in cents. A universal offer code is one that applies to all products.

api_list.name: createProductVariantCategory
api_list.description: Create a new variant category on a product.

api_list.name: createProductVariant
api_list.description: Create a new variant of a product.

api_list.name: deleteProductCustomField
api_list.description: Edit an existing product's custom field.

api_list.name: deleteProductOfferCode
api_list.description: Edit an existing product's offer code.

api_list.name: deleteProductVariantCategory
api_list.description: Permanently delete a variant category of a product.

api_list.name: deleteProductVariant
api_list.description: Permanently delete a variant of a product.

api_list.name: deleteSingleProduct
api_list.description: Permanently delete a product.

api_list.name: disableSingleProduct
api_list.description: Disable an existing product.

api_list.name: enableSingleProduct
api_list.description: Enable an existing product.

api_list.name: getProductActiveSubscribers
api_list.description: Retrieves all of the active subscribers for one of the authenticated user's products. Available with the 'view_sales' scope.

api_list.name: getProductCustomFields
api_list.description: Retrieve all of the existing custom fields for a product.

api_list.name: getProductOfferCodes
api_list.description: Retrieve all of the existing offer codes for a product. Either amount_cents or percent_off will be returned depending if the offer code is a fixed amount off or a percentage off. A universal offer code is one that applies to all products.

api_list.name: getProductSingleSubscriber
api_list.description: Retrieves the details of a subscriber to this user's product. Available with the 'view_sales' scope.

api_list.name: getProductSingleVariantCategory
api_list.description: Retrieve the details of a variant category of a product.

api_list.name: getProductVariantCategories
api_list.description: Retrieve all of the existing variant categories of a product.

api_list.name: getSingleProduct
api_list.description: Retrieve the details of a product.

api_list.name: getSingleProductOfferCode
api_list.description: Retrieve the details of a specific offer code of a product.

api_list.name: getSingleProductVariant
api_list.description: Retrieve the details of a variant of a product.

api_list.name: getUser
api_list.description: Retrieve the user's data.

api_list.name: getUserProducts
api_list.description: Retrieve all of the existing products for the authenticated user.

api_list.name: getUserSingleSale
api_list.description: Retrieves the details of a sale by this user. Available with the 'view_sales' scope.

api_list.name: getUserSubscriptions
api_list.description: Show all active subscriptions for this user.

required_parameters.name: resourceName
required_parameters.description: Currently the only supported value is sale.

api_list.name: getUserSucessfulSales
api_list.description: Retrieves all of the sucessful sales by the authenticated user. Available with the 'view_sales' scope.

required_parameters.name: after
required_parameters.description: Only return sales after this date.

required_parameters.name: before
required_parameters.description: Only return sales before this date.

api_list.name: getVariantsInVariantCategory
api_list.description: Retrieve all of the existing variants in a variant category.

api_list.name: subscribeToResource
api_list.description: Subscribe to a resource. Currently the only supported resource name is `sale`. Once subscribed you will be notified of the user's sales with an HTTP POST to your post_url.

required_parameters.name: resourceName
required_parameters.description: Currently the only supported value is sale.

api_list.name: unsubscribeFromResource
api_list.description: Unsubscribe from a resource.

api_list.name: updateProductCustomField
api_list.description: Edit an existing product's custom field.

api_list.name: updateProductOfferCode
api_list.description: Edit an existing product's offer code.

api_list.name: updateProductVariantCategory
api_list.description: Edit a variant category of an existing product.

api_list.name: updateProductVariant
api_list.description: Edit a variant of an existing product.
